I have gone through all my books and online resources looking for more 
inf=
ormation on a smith of the Chikugo Miike school, Sada Hide. The only 
refer=
ence I have found is from the Sho-Shin website where the smith is 
listed a=
s Sada Hide Bun-Ei 1264. He is not listed in Hawley, Koto 
Nihonto Zuikan, =
JSS cross-index or Yamanka's newsletters. I have a well 
worn wakishasi of =
his with all the typical Miike characteristics (wide 
hi, narrow suguha, et=
c.) and have been trying to find out any 
additional information on this pa=
rticular smith. The signature on the 
blade is Miike ju Sada Hide (very fai=
nt). Hopefully there are some 
better libraries out there...
